rationale: The segment reports identification of H7N3 but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Chickens at three other properties within the 5km restricted zone or broader 15km control area surrounding the site of the first outbreak were identified as having H7N3 last week.

rationale: This is a factual statement about identifying infections within a zone, without using high-potency language.
statement_text: Chickens at three other properties within the 5km restricted zone or broader 15km control area surrounding the site of the first outbreak were identified as having H7N3 last week.
